articles.description: A lot could have gone wrong when Ford decided to make a four-door electric crossover SUV and call it a Mustang, and even boldly put a pony badge on its nose.

articles.title: A man played the same numbers on the same day on 160 lottery tickets. He won $800,000

articles.title: See total solar eclipse in parts of South America
articles.description: A total solar eclipse was seen in Chile and Argentina as the moon moved completely in front of the sun to create this year's one and only total eclipse.

articles.title: McConnell for the first time recognizes Biden as President-elect
